title: Strengths and Weaknesses of EU-Russia/CIS cooperation in S&T: Two Visions Deriving from ISTCExperience

author: Jean-Pierre Contzen, Institute of Cell Biology and Genetic Engineering, National Academy of Science of Ukraine

segmentation: Well dear colleagues, ladies and gentlemen.
Well, it's first a pleasure for me to to be again in Ljubljana.
